settings.title: Performance Mod
settings.description: Performance-focused optimizations for storage/inventory filter-cache hotspots.
settings.section_description: Conservative runtime tuning designed for Stonehearth ACE saves.
settings.profile_description: Choose how aggressively the optimizer should cache and coalesce filter queries.

profiles.safe_description: Lowest risk. Uses very short cache windows and strict fallbacks.
profiles.balanced_description: Recommended. Moderate caching/coalescing with strong safety limits.
profiles.aggressive_description: Highest throughput. Larger cache windows with hard safety deadlines.

settings.instrumentation_description: Publishes internal counters for profiling and troubleshooting.
settings.discovery_description: Attempts conservative auto-discovery of additional safe query hook points.
settings.long_ticks_only_description: When diagnostics are enabled, only record spikes above the long-tick threshold.
settings.performance_preset_description: Quick-start tuning packs for common town sizes and server types.

presets.multiplayer_safe_description: Most conservative for shared servers. Minimizes cache risk and UI/input stalls.
presets.mega_town_stability_description: Maximum simulation safety for very high hearthling/item counts.
presets.singleplayer_throughput_description: Higher throughput for solo saves while retaining safety fallbacks.
